James Turner

  1. Foster Name:
  2. Foster Family: J. P. Stout
  3. Location of Family: Beatrice, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Beatrice, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 12
  7. Date of Birth: 1873
  8. Gender: male
  9. Notes: He committed a crime in 1885 and was send to reform school.
  10. Source: Gage County Democrat, 19 June 1885; Nebraska State Journal (Lincoln), 12 June 1885; Children's Aid Society 46th Annual Report, 1898, p. 24.
